Turn.js Flipbook - Adding Pages Example

This example shows how to add pages to your Turn.js flipbook using images from the YB COVER folder.

Current pages: 8 images (20.png through 27.png)

To add more pages:

  1. Add new images to the YB COVER folder (e.g., 28.png, 29.png)
  2. Update the 'pages' count in FlipbookSettings
  3. Add the new image paths to the pageSources array
